original_text: Sometimes you see that the south wind is blowing. So you say, “It will be very hot weather.” And the hot weather does come.
korean_text: 남풍이 부는 것을 보면 말하기를 심히 더우리라 하나니 과연 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: Sometimes you see that the south wind is blowing
sentences.korean_translation: 때로는 네가 남풍이 부는 것을 본다

sentences.original_text: It will be very hot weather
And the hot weather does come
